flow-definition.description: This Job is created to open new Version for development, inlcuindg following steps:</br> 1. create new Dev/Integ stream, eg: Archer_17.14.01_Dev\Archer_17.14.01_Integ</br> 2. create new Dev/Integ build workspace</br> 3. Create Scheduled/Formal build trigger</br> 4. Create new Version file with specfic build start number</br> 5. Copy Help folder from the base veresion</br>
